job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Why VacasaWe started with just one home and an idea: to bring homeowners and renters together with smart technology and caring local teams. Today, weâre the largest full-service vacation rental company in the US thanks to the people who give us their best every day. Youâll fit right in here if youâre curious, collaborative, innovative, and thrive in a rapid-growth environment.Why Software Engineering at Vacasa? We build the industry-leading technology that enables Vacasa to manage over 25,000 homes and service more than 2 million guest stays per year--a scale that is otherwise unprecedented in the vacation rental management industry and continues to grow. We have big ambitions and aim to move fast.We live in the cloud (AWS), empower our teams to design and operate their own applications & services, and release software into production systems many times per day.What Youâll DoAs a Software Engineer, youâll be a key contributor on your team, solving mission-critical problems working on our ever-evolving systems. We believe to shine in this role, youâre good at:Building both customer facing web apps and back-end services with modern toolsBuilding towards high quality standards and creating robust automated testsEngaging in daily stand-ups, code reviews, and architecture discussionsUtilizing DevOps tools and practices for building, deploying, and maintaining software in production environmentsOptimizing applications for maximum reliability, security, speed, and scalabilityContinuously learning new technologies and validating concepts in order to pick the right tool for the jobParticipating in a collaborative, productive culture around product-focused goalsSkills You'll Need3+ years of professional experience in full-stack developmentExperience in cloud platforms with Infrastructure as CodeExperience with JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, ReactKnowledge and experience with SQL & NoSQL databasesNice to haveCompleted a B.S./M.S. in Computer Science (or equivalent work experience)AWS Serverless techWhat Youâll GetHealth/dental/vision insuranceâ100% coverage optionEmployer Sponsored & Voluntary Supplemental Benefits401K retirement savings plan with immediate 100% company match on the first 6% you contribute Health & Dependent Care Flexible Spending AccountsFlexible vacation timePaid sick days and holidays Paid parental leave after one year of tenure Employee Assistance ProgramCareer advancement opportunitiesEmployee discounts and All the equipment youâll need to be successfulGreat colleagues and culturePlease visit our careers page to review our full benefits offeringsVacasa is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace. We do not discriminate against applicants based upon race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity, and sexual orientation), national origin, age, disability, genetic information, or other classes protected by applicable law.Vacasa is committed to maintaining a safe and productive work environment. Possession, use, or being under the influence of alcohol or illegal drugs in the workplace is prohibited.An offer of employment for this role will be contingent upon the successful completion of a background check.
